Transformation 
•  Take the data sources selected in the specification 
activity and transform them to RDF according to the 
vocabulary created in the modelling activity 
•  Some tools 
•  CSV and spreadsheets 
•  Apache Any23, RDF Refine, XLWrap, RDF123, NOR2O 
•  RDB 
•  D2R Server, ODEMapster, Morph, W3C RDB2RDF WG – 
R2RML 
•  XML 
•  GRDDL, ReDeFer 
•  http://www.w3.org/wiki/ConverterToRdf
